ğŸŒ å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒå®¹å™¨åŒ– â€‹

Webå¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒ â€‹

yaml
# docker-compose.yml
version: '3.8'
services:
  web:
    image: nginx:alpine
    ports:
      - "80:80"
    volumes:
      - ./html:/usr/share/nginx/html
  
  php:
    image: php:8.2-fpm
    volumes:
      - ./html:/var/www/html
  
  mysql:
    image: mysql:8.0
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: rootpassword
      MYSQL_DATABASE: myapp
    volumes:
      - mysql_data:/var/lib/mysql

volumes:
  mysql_data:
